column3: Name of Parent Company (for each facility, if applicable)
column6: Approximate number of workers at each site
column8: If the facility has an independent worker committee
column9: Sex-disaggregated breakdown of workers at each site
column10: % or number of migrant or contract workers
column11: What certifications, if any, the facility has
column12: List is publicly available as a csv or Excel spreadsheet in order to make this information easy to use for trade unions and NGOs
column13: Discloses what percentage of processing facilities is published
column14: If list/map covers at least 95% of the processing factories in its supply chain
column15: Publishes that this list or map of processing facilities has been updated within the past 6 months
